      • canAcceptTrade

        public boolean canAcceptTrade(int playerIndex)
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - (integer): Who's accepting / rejecting this trade,
        Returns:

      • canMaritimeTrade

        public boolean canMaritimeTrade(java.lang.String inputResource,
                                java.lang.String ouputResouce,
                                double ratio)
        Parameters:
        inputResource - resource you offer
        ouputResouce - resource you request
        ratio - of input to output resources.
        Returns:
        true if you have a vertex object in the same location as this port, and the resource cards offered are the same type as the port, and the cards offered and requested have the correct ratio.

      • canBuildRoad

        public boolean canBuildRoad(EdgeLocation roadLocation)
        Parameters:
        roadLocation - where player would like to place road
        Returns:
        true if player has enough resources to buy a road, the edge location in question is connected to a road or settlement/city belonging to the player.

      • canBuildSettlement

        public boolean canBuildSettlement(VertexLocation vertex)
        Parameters:
        vertex - this is where the player would like build a settlement
        Returns:
        true if player has enough resources to buy a Settlement, has a road connected to Hex vertex, and settlement is not within two hexEdges of another Settlement.

      • canBuildCity

        public boolean canBuildCity(VertexLocation vertex)
        Parameters:
        vertex - this is where the player would like build a City
        Returns:
        true if player has enough resources to buy a City, and owns a settlement at this location
